coding loop that everyone is freaking

huge consequences. [music]
You give an agent a list of small tasks
and it keeps picking one, implementing
it, testing it, committing the code.
It's basically a way for you to have AI
agents building your business, building
your product overnight while you sleep.
Sounds too good to be true, but it
works. [music] And it uses Claude Opus
4.5 to go and do it. So, in this
episode, this is the clearest
explanation [music]

understand it. By the end of this
episode, you will be capable to
implement [music] Ralph so that you too
could wake up to features fully done for
ideas in your head for the startup you
want to build. Enjoy the episode.

fullText: Today we're breaking down the clearest explanation of Ralph Wiggins. No, not The Simpsons character. It's the AI coding loop that everyone is freaking out about. Ralph is a simple idea with huge consequences. [music] You give an agent a list of small tasks and it keeps picking one, implementing it, testing it, committing the code. It's basically a way for you to have AI agents building your business, building your product overnight while you sleep. Sounds too good to be true, but it works.
